languages.text: Decreases wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} by −1. At the start of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is decreased by −2. ! This item cannot be unequipped.

traits.locale_text: Decreases wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} by −1. At the start of the wearer's turn, {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is decreased by −2. ! This item cannot be unequipped.

Decreases wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} by −1. At the start of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is decreased by −2. ! This item cannot be unequipped.

Decreases wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} by −1. At the start of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is decreased by −2. ! This item cannot be unequipped.

languages.text: 装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}降低1点。当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁恶化{/g}的程度降低2点。 ！此装备一旦戴上就不可卸下。
languages.original_text: Decreases wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} by −1. At the start of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is decreased by −2. ! This item cannot be unequipped.

traits.locale_text:
当装备者对{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}低于50%的敌人造成伤害时，目标还会承受“灵能抑制”效果。
当拥有“灵能抑制”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}的敌人{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁恶化{/g}的程度将会降低，等同于<u>装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。

languages.text: Понижает {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} персонажа на 1. В начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}истончение завесы{/g} ослабевает на 2. ! Этот предмет нельзя снять.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer deals damage to an enemy with 50% wounds or less, that attack inflicts psy dampening.
When an enemy with the psy dampening effect starts their turn, veil degradation is reduced by −<u>wearer's WP bonus</u>.

traits.locale_text:
Нанося урон противнику, у которого осталось 50% здоровья или меньше, персонаж накладывает на него пси-подавление.
В начале хода противника, на которого действует пси-подавление, истончение завесы уменьшается на <u>бонус ВОЛ персонажа</u>.

Нанося урон противнику, у которого осталось 50% здоровья или меньше, персонаж накладывает на него пси-подавление.
В начале хода противника, на которого действует пси-подавление, истончение завесы уменьшается на <u>бонус ВОЛ персонажа</u>.

languages.text: 使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}を1減少する。使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に、{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェールの劣化{/g}を2減少する。 ！このアイテムは装備したら外せません。
languages.original_text: Decreases wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} by −1. At the start of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is decreased by −2. ! This item cannot be unequipped.

traits.locale_text:
使用者が敵に50％以下の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}ダメージを与えるたび、その攻撃で超能力減衰を付与する。
超能力減衰の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}影響{/g}を受けた状態で敵が{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を開始すると、{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェールの劣化{/g}が<u>使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>分減少する。

languages.text: Reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} del portador en -1. Al principio del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador, la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degradación del velo{/g} se reduce en -2. ! No es posible quitarse este objeto.
languages.original_text: Decreases wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} by −1. At the start of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is decreased by −2. ! This item cannot be unequipped.

traits.locale_text:
Cada vez que el portador cause daño a un enemigo con un 50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} o menos, ese ataque inflige amortiguación psíquica.
Cuando un enemigo con el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} de amortiguación psíquica comienza su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degradación de velo{/g} se reduce en −<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} del portador</u>.

languages.text: Verringert den {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} des Trägers um −1. Zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Trägers wird {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Zerfall des Schleiers{/g} um −2 verringert. ! Dieser Gegenstand kann nicht abgelegt werden.
languages.original_text: Decreases wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} by −1. At the start of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is decreased by −2. ! This item cannot be unequipped.

traits.locale_text:
Immer wenn der Träger einem Feind mit 50 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} oder weniger Schaden zufügt, verursacht dieser Angriff Psidämpfer.
Wenn ein Feind mit dem Psidämpfer-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} beginnt, wird {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Zerfall des Schleiers{/g} um -<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WK{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Trägers</u> reduziert.

languages.text: Réduit l'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} de l'utilisateur de −1. Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'utilisateur, la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Dégradation du voile{/g} est réduite de −2. ! Cet élément ne peut pas être retiré de l'équipement.
languages.original_text: Decreases wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} by −1. At the start of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is decreased by −2. ! This item cannot be unequipped.

traits.locale_text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur inflige des dégâts à un ennemi dont la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} est inférieure ou égale à 50 %, cette attaque lui inflige l'effet Affaiblissement Psy.
Lorsqu'un ennemi sous l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} d'Affaiblissement Psy commence son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}dégradation du voile{/g} est réduite de -<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} de l'utilisateur</u>.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur inflige des dégâts à un ennemi dont la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} est inférieure ou égale à 50 %, cette attaque lui inflige l'effet Affaiblissement Psy.
Lorsqu'un ennemi sous l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} d'Affaiblissement Psy commence son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}dégradation du voile{/g} est réduite de -<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} de l'utilisateur</u>.

languages.text: Takan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi derecesini{/g} 1 puan azaltır. Takan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} başladığında, {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}örtü bozulması{/g} değeri 2 puan azalır. ! Bu eşya çıkartılamaz.
languages.original_text: Decreases wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} by −1. At the start of the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} is decreased by −2. ! This item cannot be unequipped.
